name: For the Children of the Past

steps.plaintext: Go in search of the Inscriptions of Remembrance with Arama
steps.markdown: Go in search of the Inscriptions of Remembrance with Arama

steps.plaintext: Continue searching for the Inscriptions of Remembrance
steps.markdown: Continue searching for the Inscriptions of Remembrance

steps.plaintext: Obtain the second Inscription of Remembrance
steps.markdown: Obtain the second Inscription of Remembrance

steps.plaintext: Continue searching for the Inscriptions of Remembrance
steps.markdown: Continue searching for the Inscriptions of Remembrance

steps.plaintext: Obtain the third Inscription of Remembrance
steps.markdown: Obtain the third Inscription of Remembrance

steps.plaintext: Go to the seal with Arama
steps.markdown: Go to the seal with Arama

steps.plaintext: Try to destroy the Tumor of the Withering
steps.markdown: Try to destroy the Tumor of the ◀Withering▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Withering▷

substeps.plaintext: Hit the Stone Pillar Seals with Pyro attacks. There are four seals in the main area.
substeps.markdown: Hit the ◀Stone Pillar Seals▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Stone_Pillar_Seal▷ with ◀Pyro▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Pyro▷ attacks. There are four seals in the main area.

substeps.plaintext: Use the Vintage Lyre at the Claustroflora to the northeast to open a new cave.
substeps.markdown: Use the ◀Vintage Lyre▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Vintage_Lyre▷ at the ◀Claustroflora▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Claustroflora▷ to the northeast to open a new cave.

substeps.plaintext: Destroy the fifth and sixth seals within the cave.
substeps.markdown: Destroy the fifth and sixth seals within the cave.

substeps.plaintext: Proceed deeper into the cave and use the Vintage Lyre at the Sprouting Branch to summon Healthy Dendrograna.
substeps.markdown: Proceed deeper into the cave and use the Vintage Lyre at the ◀Sprouting Branch▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Sprouting_Branch▷ to summon ◀Healthy Dendrograna▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Dendrogranum▷.

substeps.plaintext: Use the Healthy Dendrograna to make Charged Attacks at the four Special Valaya in the correct sequence. This also unlocks a Common Chest.
substeps.markdown: Use the Healthy Dendrograna to make Charged Attacks at the four ◀Special Valaya▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Valaya▷ in the correct sequence. This also unlocks a ◀Common Chest▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Common_Chest▷.

substeps.plaintext: Destroy the seventh seal in the newly opened cave.
substeps.markdown: Destroy the seventh seal in the newly opened cave.

substeps.plaintext: Use the Vintage Lyre at the Claustroflora to return to the main area.
substeps.markdown: Use the Vintage Lyre at the Claustroflora to return to the main area.

substeps.plaintext: The Ruin Grader will become invulnerable and recover its health fully once it is defeated. Reduce its HP two times to complete this step.
substeps.markdown: The ◀Ruin Grader▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Ruin_Grader▷ will become invulnerable and recover its health fully once it is defeated. Reduce its HP two times to complete this step.

steps.plaintext: At least, it proves to be a way down
steps.markdown: At least, it proves to be a way down

steps.plaintext: Go to the deepest part of the cave
steps.markdown: Go to the deepest part of the cave
